website_summaries.verdict: This is a fully packed aerial yoga kit, with a silk-like nylon fabric designed to hold you without cutting into your skin.
pros: Comes with fixators and carabiner clips
cons: Some reports of fraying of the material shortly after purchase

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, It's a "Yoga" Swing - LOL
customer_reviews.text: I suppose you could use this for yoga too. But, what I typed into the Amazon search was definitely not a "yoga" swing! However, my wife and I can attest that this works absolutely perfect for non-yoga activities. No problems with the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Binfordtools

customer_reviews.title: Fun for other stuff too
customer_reviews.text: So maybe I didn’t have the purest thoughts when I purchased this. It works great for all the adult stuff you’re trying to accomplish. I would recommend some sturdy hooks to hang it from and I added two large heavy duty clips at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Yoga4You proposes the best quality product for this price
customer_reviews.text: I work in yoga studio for more than 3 years. The time came to upgrade our yoga trapezes. I ordered a few sets from different sellers. It was a small tender and in my opinion, Yoga4You proposes the best quality product for this price. The material is nice parachute silk nylon, it feels really good and comfortable during exercising - it does not "cut" into the body. Stitches are well-done, handles are soft and strong, the plastic they are made of is different from the one we have - it looks more strong. I like the color and design itself - for yoga studio, it is quite important. I would recommend this yoga trapeze for studio and home usage.
customer_reviews.author: Handziuk Taras

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product - I love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this sooner! It is a great product - I love it! I've mounted it on the chin-up bar and started to experiment. It is so much fun!!! I can do stretching, inversion and just relax! Waiting when my boyfriend will mount my yoga trapeze to the ceiling and I will fully enjoy this wonderful tool. Great service and product!
customer_reviews.author: mary b.

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel is very nice. My only complaint is that my fat a55 ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and as described.Look and feel is very nice. My only complaint is that my fat a55 can't do some of the positions without breaking a sweat and grunting like a moose. .
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: I find this yoga trapeze very useful for exercising
customer_reviews.text: I find this yoga trapeze very useful for exercising. I'm not a yogi with years of practice, just trying to stay in shape. I have an all-day-sitting-job and it's a great relief to exercise after work, especially for my back. Also, I love that it has extension straps and the overall quality is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: I like it more than the ones we had in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to exercise aerial yoga in a studio to get back in shape. And finally, I got my own yoga trapeze! I like it more than the ones we had in a studio. As for me, the fabric is softer, the quality in common is better, carabiners are not so sharp and it looks stylish. And these daisy chains are really great! I like to use it for stretching, inverted exercises and relaxing at the end of my usual morning run. It is also really easy to take it anywhere (I like to train in the park) using the pouch. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lotsa fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for aerial activity 😉. Set up was a little tricky, but watching a youtube video clarified things for us. Love that it is washable, material is very strong, and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Scarebear

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for yoga trapeze on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this inversion swing. Its well made, comes in nice carry bag, light weight but still durable, super easy to set up, took me like 5-10 minutes, and I was already upside down. Handles feel sturdy. I like that I can travel with it if I want, small & light enough in bag, and just find a tree or beam to tie on to. Worth the extra $10-20 more than the cheapest ones avail on Amazon. Still super inexpensive. These used to cost about $300 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Russ

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase mounting hardware!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for all ages and levels! Would have given 5 stars if it would have included mounting brackets and a booklet or dvd with some moves to help get you started!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This would be a nice gift for anyone that is into fitness and yoga. I like the inversion aspect and was interested in purchasing something on that order for years. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jld

customer_reviews.title: Yoga and MORE.
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun to use even for beginners. Big and holds enough for 2 person "fun".
customer_reviews.author: B. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So I’m not going to lie, I bought many versions of the trapeze swing to figure out which one best suited my studio. The photo is true to color. It’s definitely durable and made of a material that has a nice feel to it. Seems like sweat wouldn’t ruin it either which is awesome. I’ve had mine for a few weeks and my instructors love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aerial Artistry LLC

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what I'd do without my swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing...only problem is I out grew it (rolling up I need more fabric) and need to upgrade to full silks. My whole family uses it daily. We swing, do yoga poses and crack our backs. I do inverted crunches and also use it like gymnastic rings.
customer_reviews.author: T Martinez

customer_reviews.title: top quality...
customer_reviews.text: just received my yoga-trapeze from Yoga-4-You and i must say i'm impressed... i haven't hung it up yet but everything arrived in mint-new condition, the trapeze is triple-stitched with heavy-duty carabiners and is packed in it's own bag as are the two extension-straps that are 48" and well made with very heavy-duty stitching... i scanned their QR code with my phone and they emailed me their detailed and informative Yoga Swing Guide...
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Yoga, and OTHER BETTER USES
customer_reviews.text: Those with impure searches, rest easy in ordering this apparatus, as it is a great addition and will suit your needs perfectly. Very secure and sturdy while still feeling soft and silky. it's not an eye sore that needs to constantly be put up and taken down. The fact it's actually an aerial yoga apparatus allows me to leave it up in the bedroom all the time without our kids wondering what it ACTUALLY FOR :) Buy heavy duty eye hooks to mount it- I also used rigging anchor shackles to secure the straps to the bolts in the ceiling. Mounting hardware i purchased from Lowes/ Home D was under $10 and will easily accommodate over 1600 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Dank

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I did not get to use it but twice. because of the weather. my husband and I built a 6x6 beams across the back porch and on both sides we put 6x6 beams under the top beam going across the top . So this spring I can paint it grey the color of or cabin and when I am not working out I can hang about four hanging flower baskets. But it fells great on my back were I had two back surgeries.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E.

customer_reviews.title: I am overwhelmed with excitement & love! I love my yoga trapeze
customer_reviews.text: I am overwhelmed with excitement & love! I love my yoga trapeze! I have told everyone I work with & all my friends about this! My life is forever changed! I was instantly intrigued by this marvelous invention when it first caught my attention through an advertisement in the land of Facebook. All that night I was infatuated by the idea & knew I was going to hang upside down, get my blood flowing and approve low back pain. The yoga trapeze is going to transform me into a flexible yoga goddess. I have it hanging on my porch, as you can see I took my porch swing down off the hooks & it's a perfect place to hang!
customer_reviews.author: Blizz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice not that bad to install but really doesn't help with my lower back pain my kids use it for playing around I guess it's useful for something.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio l

customer_reviews.title: Well made and delivered in a timely matter.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and holds up to the sellers claims. I used a gambrel and hammock frame to set it up in my bedroom so I didn't have to put holes in my ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Hill

customer_reviews.title: Exciting at home “aerial” yoga experience!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more excited for this product!! I bought this as a gift for my yoga-loving friend. She’s taken a few aerial yoga classes and fell in love, but the classes are so expensive that she could not go very often. This is an amazing alternative for great stretches, exercises, and practicing some smaller aerial yoga movement. Literally a Great tool to hang around in; she has an amazing balcony with a beautiful view and is able to use the hooks to hang it on the balcony Terrace. There are so many instructional videos online and it’s just a fun item to explore around all the possibilities. 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Allison Miller

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not safe
customer_reviews.text: This works just as well as the yoga trapeze however, I'd replace the caribiners that come with it since those are non rated and I feel sketchy about them holding up with a lot of moving. Plus I'm not a fan of falling on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlee M Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: This swing comes with minimal installation instructions, no diagrams or parts list labeling the various straps or how they fit together. I have spent so much time over several days looking for information to help with installation. In addition to an ebook, a detailed parts list with diagrams should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Loraine R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for all ages and sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself, but may be buying more for my family! We all love it! It is just as safe and effective for the 40 pound members all the way up to 300+ pound members of the family. I'm so impressed! It takes some getting used to if you aren't familiar or are out of shape. It's a blast to use. I'm not a big fan of exercise for the sake of it, but this is so much fun that I can see me using it multiple times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Donnay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Can also be used as a sex swing. I love when my master ties me up in the and has me hanging upside down
customer_reviews.author: Billy bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, sturdy, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and far cheaper than the competitors. It was easy to install and I only needed to purchase eye hooks separately from my local hardware store. Adjustment is easy and quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Glaittli

customer_reviews.title: Great product very stable
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have back problems and this right here is able to invert you and take pressure off of your back and it's a great way of working out to
customer_reviews.author: Lance Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I use it 4 x per week and it is really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Good product but confusing
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product but it is definitely not for me. Instructions (you have to print) are horrible and once you figure out the correct pose you are exhausted and frustrated. Maybe YouTube has better instructions. But be careful. I ended up with a concussion because instructions are horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love aerial eyoga, you will love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I have really missed my aerial yoga classes since we've been locked down. I easily installed the pieces using the clear delivery instructions and visuals. I am using them on a very strong pullup bar. I don't have a tall door so i can't hang fully inverted but even so I am thrilled to have this. My joints were instantly relaxed after using the set and I could do anything I wanted. The large silk is big enough for me to cocoon in. Everything feels super sturdy and the purple color is lovely. It's all comfortable materials and I can't believe how lucky I am to have aerial in my home yoga space!
customer_reviews.author: GreenhousePDX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Installion instructions could’ve been maybe a tad bit more detailed. Other than that, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa_S

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my basement. Extension straps rocks! I'm practicing not only inverted exercises but also other yoga asanas with this yoga swing. It feels differently using the hammock and without it. Try to make a Tree asana standing inside the hammock - it requires bigger effort to stabilize. But for example, Bow pose is easier to complete with yoga swing. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anton Shakirzianov

customer_reviews.title: Now in black
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses blue aerial yoga trapeze from Yoga4You for almost a year and she’s fully satisfied with it, so we decided to bought this black yoga swing as a present for our friend. Good design and premium quality for a great price! The best present for a yoga person.
customer_reviews.author: Artem S.

customer_reviews.title: Swing cutting into me?
customer_reviews.text: Does every areil swing dog into you like this one does? If so it’s a five star. Otherwise it’s a three I’m sorry I have nothing to compare it to. Seems like the material should have a tiny bit of give.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH BRYEN

customer_reviews.title: Kinky Fun And Games......😉
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's birthday, in order to engage in a little adult fun. Haven't had a chance to use it yet, but it seems well put together and I have no doubts it will bring just as much fun into our bedroom as I'm anticipating !
customer_reviews.author: Annet Q

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Easy to put up just needed hardware hooks but those are cheap and easy if you go to Lowe’s or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.text: So fun for our whole family, allows me to get some serious stretching in my own home! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Regan Strand

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing.
customer_reviews.text: The company has excellent customer service. The swing is solid, sturdy, and nice. I would like it to be a little bigger but I should have paid better attention to the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: EJS

customer_reviews.title: Ok for home
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, but fabric is not soft, and I should of gotten a larger footage so it could be like classes
customer_reviews.author: Angelina B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife on her birthday. She's a personal trainer. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: brian barnes

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I have had a bit of trouble with ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have had a bit of trouble with vertigo after inversions. I am sure that will improve with time. The only down side for me is wishing the fabric didn't cut into me. It is soft swishy fabric, but when bunched up, and with body weight or applied pressure to hips/butt/etc that is a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun apparatus and great workout
customer_reviews.text: I have an aerial arts hammock, but wanted something with handles to increase my training intensity without twisting my hands/knuckles. I use it for aerial pushups, for instance. I'm loving the extra core challenge and my hands are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Landry

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is very sturdy and I am confident that it won't break and drop me. The installation instructions could have been a bit clearer, but I think I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Up North

customer_reviews.title: Back pain relief
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended that I do yoga to help improve my back and shoulder mobility, so I decided to get this swing. It is easy to set up and I can easily hang upside down to stretch out my back. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Moran

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about yoga, but I now have an awesome swing in my basement! It is fun to use and you can get some really good stretches in with it as well. It felt super sturdy, and both I and my husband enjoy it greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The best for workout!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this kind of tool for a long time. It is perfect for workout and stretching. I do not have any problems with my back - but after inverted exercises I really feel like a flying butterfly. This yoga swing is great - you can even just lay in it to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My back loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an impulse by when I was up one night late with back pain. This has helped my back so much, anytime it gets stiff I can immediately go invert on the swing and feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once set up I found it very useful and feel better. Set up can be challenging but not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No anchors.
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI, does not come with hooks to attach to ceiling. It does come with a pamphlet which suggests hooks to buy depending on where you plan to hang. Other than that this has been a fun buy, I did have to look up my own beginners videos on YouTube but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Emagikalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching
customer_reviews.text: This is great. However, make sure you realize you also have to order hardware to attach this to the ceiling. We got this and were excited to get in installed, realizing only after we bought it that we had to wait a few more days after ordering the correct hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie FiveTwenty

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when purchasing this product. Both myself and my husband weigh over 200lbs. But the weight limit is plenty to hold that on ratings but still. So after using it I have been so impressed with it and looking forward to getting stronger and better at using it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT work with door mount as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this product unless you plan to hang it from the ceiling or a high tree branch outside. Purchased the door mount, made by the same company, assuming it would work. It would only work if you're about 2 feet tall. When properly mounted, the seat of the swing comes to just above my knees. I am 5'6", not particularly tall by any measure, and it would be comical if it weren't such a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Harding

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to buying this product as I am fairly new to aerial yoga. This product came in fast, and I was very pleased with it. I ordered the wall mount bar separately, with my own screws, as it doesn't come with any mounting equipment. The fabric is strong and silky, it holds me up just fine and I am 5'4" 170lbs. It comes with an ebook that shows plenty of beginner and moves into advanced poses with instructions. Overall I love it! Especially the color!
customer_reviews.author: Free Bird AY

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to surprise my fiancé we have wanted a swing for a while. I’ve tested it I weight around 245 and it holds me just find I was swinging and climbing all over to make sure it would hold!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: God I love this swing
customer_reviews.text: God I love this swing! I was going to the Chiro 3 times a week then two then one and eventually no more visits after starting to use this daily. One of the best products I have purchased, my whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and well made
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to break up the yoga routine and get some assistance with balancing more on my hands. This great and was easy to assemble. Please note that you will need swing anchors or bolts if you can't loop the extension ropes around a beam. I bolted mine to the ceiling beams.
customer_reviews.author: luv2read

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this works great for not yoga.
customer_reviews.text: We picked up this swing for not yoga, and it works great for not yoga. If that's why you're here, do it up, definitely worth the investment. Super easy to install in a power cage.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great features a quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for various stretches and exercises. I am not doing "tricks" or anything upside down. I especially like the handholds at different heights. It allows me to stretch my upper body in a way I couldn't do at home... excellent for shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Quality made.
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing around on this thing for a week or so now. I've also let my son play on it. We both enjoy it thoroughly. I'm starting to think the yoga swing is made much more sturdy than my own body. I hung it from an 8" cedar beam with 6" mounting screws. It's not going anywhere. Has bonus "after hours" function as an...intimacy swing. Also tested and approved.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! Started as an impulse buy but I am so happy I got it. Great for stretching and strength building. It was easy to install for hammock purposes however I did have to purchase hanging hardware separately. Bonus... my husband is excited to try it for "other" activities.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Bailey

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ITEMS
customer_reviews.text: I AM MISSING THE EXTENSION STRAPS AND THE EBOOK😤😤😤 Delivery was fast, but it defeats the purpose if there's pieces missing and no instructions 😡
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Freakin' Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome trapeze! Alot of fun to play on! I used my pull up bar to hang it on and have had a lot of fun so far! There are so many tutorials online for workouts and flows! This thing is awesome! The trapeze is super sturdy and very well made! I don't feel any hesitation getting on and flipping upsidedown!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this hammock. Bought it for myself to practice ariel yoga and for my son with sensory processing issues. For me I love building strength ans flexibility. For my son the compression, inversion and swinging really benefit him.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use, feels natural almost! It's also beautiful. I love the color. I can already feel my chronic back pain diminishing! I will likely get two more of these for my daughters as they are going to be on mine all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inversion tool for regular workout, TRX and just relax
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga trapeze swing! I love it! It's really useful tool for those who want to keep the body in shape and soul in harmony. You can practice yoga, inversions exercises which are great for your back, use it just like a hammock for relax. I often use only handles for TRX training - it is much cheaper. It is portable - so you can take it with you anywhere. Super easy to install. High-quality product. I have already bought 2 more yoga swing kits as presents to my sister and my friend. Definitely, recommend! Especially if you need some stretch and relax for your back - inversion exercises are something!
customer_reviews.author: Lakmus

customer_reviews.title: Never tried this before! Pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous at first, but it’s awesome! It doesn’t have instructions, but I just move around and stretch. It definitely helps with my back pain and overall feels awesome!
customer_reviews.author: CraftyAtoZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used the yoga body trapeze at a class but could not stomach the price! Use this multiple times now and so far it is great! I love the color as well! My 4 year old loves swinging on it like a hammock, my husband does pull ups off of the handles and I use it as a trapeze! Very versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: Well packed, good quality Yoga Swing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very good quality. I read that a person said it was frayed, but this one is not frayed at all. I did replace the D-Rings with rock climbing clips, because I wanted to make sure we didn't have an accident, but after closer inspection, the original ones probably would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: B-Girl

customer_reviews.title: Need to download bar code app on phone to open ebook
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. I had to download a bar code app on my phone to open the e-book but it did work slick so I am pleased.. I like the beginning poses recommended. I like the fact the ebook is in PDF format so I can print it out.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I am 57 and 180lb. This in just 2 weeks has made me so much more flexible. Its amazing and I fall a lot and this helps me get more flexible safely with out falling on the floor! A must have and so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond wells

customer_reviews.title: Like it but hammock could be softer
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use the handles to help stretch out however, the hammock it very uncomfortable. The edges of the fabric feel very hard and dig into my skin. Wish it was more stretchy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stoked on this purchase, it came on time and in good condition. The installation wss fast and so easy that's I couldn't believe it when I turned and poof, I was done. I have it a test spin instantly and was fully satisfied with the quality of product, the depth of stretch it helped me find and well...so far I'd say it's one of a 4.5 star product and definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rya Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Took my yoga to the next level!
customer_reviews.text: I have needed a dynamic way to hang upside down and elongate my spine while strengthening my whole body and am very glad to have this yoga trapeze. It involves and strengthens my body as a whole and is very versatile. My only concern is that sometimes the material rubs on the hinge of the carabeener and I’m afraid it will rip. I flipped the carabeener over and it happens less. The rest of the construction is very sturdy and comfortable to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Paris

customer_reviews.title: OMG, LOVE THIS SWING!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SWING! Purchased after reading many reviews and looking closely at material types, lengths, etc. because they're not all the same. So happy with this purchase ~ THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only used once but it seems to have great potential. It was sturdy enough to support my ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used once but it seems to have great potential. It was sturdy enough to support my 200 plus frame well with out any hints of ripping sounds. Extreamly easy to put up, I ended up using a beam from my patio but could work easily with a sturdy branch. There is an idea guide on how to get started with the sling, but we ended up using it more as a swing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The exercises you can do on it are endless. We have owned all kinds of exercise equipment,, enough to fill a large room. You can get as good or a better workout with just the swing, then take it down and put it in its small bag in seconds. No need for all that large heavy equipment taking up space!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids... I mean wife.
customer_reviews.text: Since our garage is open at the top we put it there. My wife uses it often, my kids use it every day. lol They just play with it, but it works great for them. My wife does her yoga stretching since her accident, and it helps her keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Regalado

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase of 2018!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing! After figuring out the best way to mount it (into a 4x4 beam in my garage about 2 ft apart) our whole family is enjoying it. The material feels sturdy and supportive, easy to readjust and align for whichever height you require. I wish we had bought this sooner, our little one uses it as a swing and it's turned the new home gym in our garage into a really fun place to be!
customer_reviews.author: ML&B

customer_reviews.title: This swing is so fun. I excersize on it and my kids 4-13 ...
customer_reviews.text: This swing is so fun. I excersize on it and my kids 4-13 play on it all the time. Its great for rainy days with the kids and great for back pain too!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga swing is beyond amazing! I originally got this due to back pain that flared up randomly. Super easy to use, even for a first timer like myself or for someone without any yoga skills or knowledge. The three lengths of handles is convenient, as well, especially when I start feeling unsteady and flounder like a fish about to fall off a cliff. Everyone needs this yoga swing!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It’s so fun
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy.. Easy to use my myself down to my 10 year old daughter. The straps are very easy to adjust and fit well. Material dries fast (mine is outside). Good for all it’s of sizes and shapes of people.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend smell of material gives me headache
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend because of the chemicals used to make this. I had outside everyday and the offgasing never stopped, the smell gave me a headache, I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with a little hesitation, since I couldn't feel the material. It is very well made, sturdy and easy to install. Instructions and examples are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie McMartin

customer_reviews.title: No ceiling mounts
customer_reviews.text: I order this one because it was supposed to come with ceiling mounts... They were not included in the package!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product-even for beginers
customer_reviews.text: This aerial yoga trapeze kit came with hanging and mounting instructions and I got eBook by email with poses. Yoga trapeze is super sturdy, great quality, handles are comfy. It helps a lot with my back after sitting in the office all day. I love this black design. And my kids having fun using it like a swing! It`s a great product for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Ulko

customer_reviews.title: ... need to set it up and it has a great bag to pack it all up
customer_reviews.text: It comes with everything you need to set it up and it has a great bag to pack it all up. The fabric was not exactly what I thought it was going to be but it is very sturdy. The only problem I have had is finding a level tree branch to hang it from but you can use beams as well. Also I would like the straps to hang it be a little longer but over all it is a great product
customer_reviews.author: demi

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: So far no dislikes. It took a day to figure out where to put it. I mostly wanted to be able to hang upside down in order to relieve back pain and so far it seems to be working. I haven’t had time to fully enjoy the rest of the experience but look forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Stringy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my aerial yoga swing had threads EVERYWHERE. There is even a rip. I read all great reviews before purchasing.. had high expectations but was very disappointed when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Yoga4You
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality product. I've used it daily since I got it. This makes exercise run and exciting!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but we were not impressed with the usability. The kids enjoyed swinging on it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I have a lot of chronic back pain, this has been wonderful. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Glad I finally ordered it!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Yoga trapeze. My daughter is homeschooled and it's great for stretches, excercises, and just kicking back and reading a book.
customer_reviews.author: Aolani

customer_reviews.title: Check the knots
customer_reviews.text: It's cool, but knot became untied and I fell on my bottom. Good thing I wasn't trying something crazy. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with hardware
customer_reviews.text: Swing is made of great quality material. You’ll need to purchase the hardware to install it separately.
customer_reviews.author: A. James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this.. put it up and had all kinds of laughs trying to do a back flip my foot got stuck in the strap and i was upside down for minute have u ever laughed upside down before well I have today.. its priceless
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Woman

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: this yoga swing set is perfect. no issues at all. would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: zac

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 225 pounds. I was super skeptical of how safe I would feel. Turns out I feel safe. This is very well made in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Saindon

customer_reviews.title: Yoga4You aerial swing is high quality!
customer_reviews.text: It came just as expected. The fabric is sturdy and comfortable. Super strong carabineers facilitate the setup making it quick and easy. The e-book is super helpful for me as a beginner. Just in one use my back and all muscles felt better following the guide.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and eas assembly. You have to purchase the mounts separately.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this yoga swing
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing purchase. I love it and my kids love it too. Easy to take along to parks or anywhere with and over hang. Super easy set up we use it in our garage no problem .
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my yoga swing!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, affordable yoga swing! I’m new at this and love the pdf manual they sent when I provided my email.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peters

product_meta.title: Yoga4You Aerial Yoga Swing Set - Yoga Hammock Swing - Trapeze Yoga Kit - 2 Extension Straps - Wide Flying Yoga Inversion Tool - Antigravity Ceiling Hanging Yoga Sling - Adult Kids Arial
feature_bullets: DURABLE and PRACTICAL: Aerial flying yoga swing hammock is made of studio quality silk nylon fabric. Blue anti gravity yoga hanging kit is strong enough to bear the weight up to 600 lbs

COMFORT: Large wide antigravity yoga hammock swing (98"x59") has double material layer in the middle part for maximum comfort. Best exercise fly air yoga swing set with thick foam handles makes your aerial inversions more pleasant
BROAD INSTALLATION OPTIONS: With the help of 2x50" hanging straps and exposed beam, you can install yoga trapeze on 10ft height. Find your perfect spot for aerial exercises!
BENEFITS: Even few short sessions per week on anti-gravity inversion tool bring back pain relief. Aerial equipment develops your core muscles, improves stretching and fun for kids
eBOOK: Digital guide in PDF provides basic ceiling mount and hanging instructions, starter aerial poses for blue swing trapeze beginners
